Instead, I think it might be better to have a few specialized operations for embedding and avoid supporting hybrid tensors on all ops.

Is the proposal having two sparse representations? One being embedding gradients (i.e. hybrid), and the other being more naive COO (matrix only) or CSR? If so, I strongly disagree. It would be really confusing to users that embedding's sparse gradient is not the same as other sparse tensors.
